author: Andrew Evers
title: Orion Span's Aurora Station aims to be the first space hotel
text:
Andrew Evers | @andevers6 Published 12:01 AM ET Sun, 6 May 2018
It's time to start planning your vacation to space. Orion Span unveiled plans to launch the first hotel in orbit, called the Aurora Station.
The plan is for guests stay 12 days. They can spend their time using VR and live-streaming to friends back on Earth. Guests will be able to experiment with growing food and plants can be taken home as souvenirs.
The company says the space hotel is slated to launch in 2021 and will be ready for guests in 2022.
You can reserve your spot now for $80,000. The full trip, including the launch, will start at $9.5 million.
